41.1.behavioral_axis: Begins new experiences only when the container and timing feel right.
41.1.shadow_axis: Scarcity anxiety stalls beginnings; fears wasting the one chance.

41.2.behavioral_axis: Casually kicks off fresh experiences without forcing others.
41.2.shadow_axis: Resents pressure to start on command; withdraws the spark.

41.3.behavioral_axis: Learns correct initiation by surviving a few awkward launches.
41.3.shadow_axis: Jumps into everything; burns fuel on misaligned starts.

41.4.behavioral_axis: Organizes first steps so the network can begin together.
41.4.shadow_axis: Stokes FOMO to control who gets included.

41.5.behavioral_axis: Others expect you to launch the next cycle for everyone.
41.5.shadow_axis: Blamed for outcomes if the journey disappoints.

41.6.behavioral_axis: Models initiating only when conditions truly support the path.
41.6.shadow_axis: Controls timing from above; judges others’ eagerness.

42.1.behavioral_axis: Builds structure so projects can reach real completion.
42.1.shadow_axis: Avoids endings; keeps things open from fear of loss.

42.2.behavioral_axis: Wraps cycles cleanly and extracts the lesson.
42.2.shadow_axis: Shuts down if rushed to hurry the ending.

42.3.behavioral_axis: Discovers sustainable closure through messy attempts.
42.3.shadow_axis: Drops commitments; reputation for not following through.

42.4.behavioral_axis: Leads the tribe through endings and integration.
42.4.shadow_axis: Guilt-leverages people to stay until you’re done.

42.5.behavioral_axis: Others expect you to land the plane every time.

42.6.behavioral_axis: Embodies dignified endings that feed the next cycle.
42.6.shadow_axis: Judges those who pivot early as quitters.

43.1.behavioral_axis: Builds opinions from solitary breakthroughs before sharing.

43.2.behavioral_axis: Drops crystalline ideas without much effort.
43.2.shadow_axis: Irritated when forced to explain the how.

43.3.behavioral_axis: Finds the right framing by surviving awkward first drafts.
43.3.shadow_axis: Social fallout from premature or abrasive delivery.

43.4.behavioral_axis: Translates lone insight so the community can adopt it.

43.5.behavioral_axis: Others expect breakthrough explanations on demand.
43.5.shadow_axis: Accused of arrogance or manipulation if it lands poorly.

43.6.behavioral_axis: Lives as proof that solitary insight can guide a culture.

44.1.behavioral_axis: Checks present motives against remembered patterns.
44.1.shadow_axis: Suspicion becomes default; reads threat everywhere.

44.2.behavioral_axis: Course-corrects group dynamics before problems grow.
44.2.shadow_axis: Annoyed at being accused of paranoia; withdraws.

44.3.behavioral_axis: Learns accurate patterning by surviving false alarms.

44.4.behavioral_axis: Manages alliances to keep the tribe safe and effective.

44.5.behavioral_axis: Others expect you to detect threats and stabilize optics.
44.5.shadow_axis: Blamed for political outcomes either way.

44.6.behavioral_axis: Holds long memory so mistakes aren’t repeated.

45.1.behavioral_axis: Defines structures for how resources are gathered and shared.

45.2.behavioral_axis: Attracts assets and convenes people around a table.

45.3.behavioral_axis: Learns ethical leadership by correcting misuses of power.
45.3.shadow_axis: Grabs control; seen as petty monarch.

45.4.behavioral_axis: Speaks for the people about resources and direction.
45.4.shadow_axis: Politics over principle to keep the chair.

45.5.behavioral_axis: Others expect decisive leadership and fair distribution.
45.5.shadow_axis: Blamed as tyrant if decisions hurt someone's benefit.

45.6.behavioral_axis: Embodies that leadership serves people before hierarchy.

46.1.behavioral_axis: Builds safety by honoring the body’s signals before action.
46.1.shadow_axis: Clumsy from anxiety; ignores somatic cues.

46.2.behavioral_axis: Falls into the right place without forcing.
46.2.shadow_axis: Resents being watched or coached while moving.

46.3.behavioral_axis: Finds trust in the body through messy experience.

46.4.behavioral_axis: Creates environments where others can land in their bodies.

46.5.behavioral_axis: Others expect you to align people with correct roles/timing.

46.6.behavioral_axis: Lives as proof that devotion to embodiment attracts right timing.

47.1.behavioral_axis: Needs enough pieces to form a coherent picture.
47.1.shadow_axis: Shames self for confusion; mental compression.

47.2.behavioral_axis: Realizes the story behind experiences without forcing it.
47.2.shadow_axis: Irritated when pushed to explain half-baked insights.

47.3.behavioral_axis: Finds true meaning by revising failed interpretations.

47.4.behavioral_axis: Gives the network digestible lessons from past events.
47.4.shadow_axis: Curates the story to manage optics.

47.5.behavioral_axis: Others expect you to crystallize the lesson for everyone.
47.5.shadow_axis: Blamed as manipulative if truth is uncomfortable.

47.6.behavioral_axis: Embodies patience until meaning truly lands.

48.1.behavioral_axis: Creates solid skill depth before stepping forward.

48.2.shadow_axis: Annoyed by demands to perform depth on cue.

48.3.behavioral_axis: Builds competence through visible mistakes and repairs.

48.4.behavioral_axis: Distributes depth so the community functions better.

48.5.behavioral_axis: Others expect you to deliver the solution and raise the bar.
48.5.shadow_axis: Impostor panic or accused of elitism.

48.6.behavioral_axis: Shows that real depth arrives exactly when needed.
